title: The Long Dance Home
description: As Cece Camden reaches her 29th birthday, her life takes an unexpected turn that throws the level-headed, disciplined, former ballerina into turmoil. After a chance encounter with an old dance rival who makes a surprising request, Cece discovers a secret about her past and makes a life-changing decision.With a broken heart and an unknown future, she returns to her hometown at Christmas time and is lured back into the life she had escaped years ago, vowing never to return. Immersing herself in a production of The Nutcracker, she struggles to let go of the life she had dreamed of and the love she left behind.---------------No longer in print
author: Julie Mayerson Brown
